question.text: Powered vehicles used by disabled people are small and hard to see. How do they give early warning when on a dual carriageway?

explanation.text: Powered vehicles used by disabled people are small, low, hard to see and travel very slowly. On a dual carriageway a flashing amber light will warn other road users.

answer.text: They will have a flashing red light
They will have a flashing green light
They will have a flashing blue light
They will have a flashing amber light
